favourite.article: French: En devenant pareils à Christ En vie, nature, expression et fonction, Nous sommes qualifiés pour travailler Avec Lui pour Son Corps. En dépendant désespérément De Lui comme amour et force, En écoutant Ses paroles, Notre espoir est d’être enlevé par la rédemption De notre corps. Et nous prions : « Viens, Seigneur Jésus ! » Et nous prions : « Viens, Seigneur Jésus ! » « Viens, Seigneur Jésus ! Seigneur Jésus, viens ! »
Such a beautiful song! Does anyone know where I can find it in French?

Lord Jesus, we don't want to delay Your coming, we want to hasten it. Why live for something of this world if it'll become naught when Christ returns? We need to be reminded that we don't belong to this age. Lord, consummate the age!! Our prayer today is "Come, Lord Jesus!"
Oh, come Lord Jesus, come we love You, come in us, Come into our hearts, O Lord Jesus! His goings forth are from ancient times, From the days of eternity Amen (Micah 5:2) <3
And our prayer is Come Lord Jesus! Make us Your overcomers in today's age. Make us Your age-turners and age-enders!
Come Lord Jesus! This Hymn touched me so deeply during the National College Training 2015. I'll never forget watching 1100 people consecrate themselves that final night.
Lord, makes those who bring You back! Come, Lord Jesus!
Lord Jesus, come quickly!
Come Lord Jesus!
And our prayer is— “Come, Lord Jesus!” And our prayer is— “Come, Lord Jesus!” “Come, Lord Jesus! Lord Jesus, come
Oh Lord Jesus we love You! Come Lord.
Come, Lord Jesus
Amen, come Lord Jesus!!!
My prayer. So uplifting.
Come Lord Jesus.

"Who is this who comes up from the wilderness Leaning on her beloved?" (Song of Songs 8:5a)
The Testimony of Jesus is the Bride of Christ - "God does not want those who are strong in themselves; He wants only the feeble ones, the weaker ones, the women and children; those who are counted worthy to be overcomers will be the weaker ones who depend on the Lord (1 Corinthians 1:26-28; 2 Corinthians 12:9-10; 13:3-5; S.S. 8:6)" ~ HWMR The Mending Ministry of John, p 99
Amen! Come Lord Jesus!!! Lord Jesus come!!!
Lord, we love You. Come, Lord Jesus.
Summer 2001, Summer 2003, Summer 2005, Winter 2007 & Winter 2008. Longing for..., always.
Amen =)
Amen! Lord Jesus we can't wait to see You Lord! Thank You for the enjoyment!
Amen...
Never forget this one, as I drove back to Wichita - Kansas, after attending Summer Training 2005. Lord be with you all, Amen.
COME LORD JESUS
Lord Jesus, come. You're my hope of glory.
lovely song
Lord Jesus, Come!
Lord, may Your speaking be our speaking. We pray that You may come for Your bride, Your glorious church. May our prayer fulfill Your eternal purpose.
Lord Jesus come!! this is our prayer for Your return!! Lord grow in us until we are being conformed into Your image, becoming the same as You are in life, nature and expression!!
It is the need of my soul. I am crazy of You my Saviour. Oh Lord Jesus, COME COME COME!

As we were preparing to go out to visit our neighborhoods for the gospel, this song came to me. The Lord was telling me that through His redemption, and becoming the same as He is, in life, nature, expression and function, we are qualified to work with Him for His body. That word Qualified made it clear to me, that Christ desire is not our working but His working Himself into us so He can build His Body.
Dear Lord, such a beautiful sweet song. I am extremely touched by the words and sing along. Yes Lord We are waiting for Your coming back. May all saints be ready to be raptured by Him.
Amen. The Lord is working on us everyday so that we can become the same as He is in life, nature, expression and function. Thank You Lord !

Thank You Lord that we can depend on You as You are the arm of Jehovah to strengthen us when we are helpless, and to embrace us when we need consolation. Praise You for Your heart to make us You. Cause us to live for Your Body and express You rightly. I love You Lord! Come, Lord Jesus!
I love this hymn very much as I love the Lord..May our prayer is come Lord Jesus!!may we are ready to meet our Beloved Bridegroom!!We love you Lord!!
This song causes us to know that His coming back is fully related to our readiness. Lord, build us up till You come!

COME LORD JESUS!! We sang this song many times at the young people's Poland conference, every meeting. It touches my heart so dearly. Lord we need You. We just pray that we will be ready for You return.
Come Lord Jesus, I pray that You will come today, but Your will be done. Help us who long for Your coming to be strong until You come.

We were singing this song in the East Coast summer school of truth, and as I listened to so many saints saying "Come Lord Jesus!" it was so powerful and moving, I knew that the Lord really will come one day. It's up to us to bring Him back.
and my prayer is come Lord Jesus!

Amen. Come Lord Jesus!
I am realizing what a need there is for a vision! We need to pray each morning during our personal time with the Lord for a vision! A vision to focus on throughout the day. We need to pray that we and all the saints would be useful and active that day. We cannot be passive! There have been many passive Christians in the past, but that is just not acceptable now. We are part of a new age that will bring the Lord Jesus back! We cannot be passive.
I am finding that choosing a verse or two in Revelation and pray reading them every morning is really changing my daily life. We are not just pursuing, we are pursuing toward the goal! I pray that all saints, especially the young people, realize this!
I am a young person, but that doesn't mean I have the right to be passive! Reading "The worlds situation and Gods move" helped me realize that as an American young person in the church life, I have a big responsibility!
Hallelujah!!! We must be prepared for His coming back. And our prayer must be COME LORD JESUS!!! AMEN!
And our prayer is "COME, LORD JESUS!!!, COME, LORD JESUS!!!"
Praise the Lord, I like this song because it reminds me how much I'm close to the Lord, and how much I love the Lord through this song.
I love this song. It touches my heart so dearly!
I like this song because it refreshes my love toward our Lord Jesus. Whenever I sing this song I cry deep within for longing for His appearing. Amen.

HALLELUJAH SAINTS! "We need Christ to receive the kingdom from God and come to crush all the beasts in us and then to become a great mountain that comprises us and that fills the whole earth to be the kingdom of God." [ICBM] AMEN.
Praise the Lord....We await Your coming Lord, that we will be fully matured in You, possessing Your life and nature...oh keep us longing, Lord! You are our everything.

We sang this song during a College Conference in Anaheim.. I just remember weeping and truly yearning for the Lord's return. You just sensed the same feeling in the entire building. So many young people eagerly awaiting the Lord's return! And our prayer is Come, Lord Jesus! Lord Jesus, Come!
Oh Lord Jesus!!! This song is our prayer..OH LORD JESUS, COME!!!! We need You every minute in my life, You are my life!
Come, Lord Jesus...This should be our prayer! Amen.
Amen. We should all be ready and wholeheartedly tell the Lord, "Come Lord Jesus!"
This song is the cry, the prayer of my heart. Come Lord Jesus!
Amen, come Lord Jesus!! May we be ready and waiting for You.
Come, Lord Jesus...!

This hymn remind me all the time to live in the present of the Lord, i fear and never be away from his present and to live in the light of His coming all the time, in my whole life .May I be ready before His coming back and be His overcomer. Finally, I want to cry as the apostle John did, "Come Lord Jesus."
Amen! Come, Lord Jesus!
COME LORD JESUS ----this should be our prayer!!!!

當我們無依無靠的信靠主，倚靠祂作我們的愛和力量， 並且聽祂說話，我們的盼望就是藉著身體的得贖而被提， 我們的禱告乃是：『主耶穌阿，我願你來！』
i like this hymn..new website and fresh hymns and spiritual songs
I like this song becasue it reminds me to be depend upon the Lord. To let him do his work through us,in us and for us as we trust in him helplessly.
this song is great!how we need to pray that God will come soon..
